title: Threesome Interlude
description: Lynne Morrison works hard and plays hard. After a particularly stressful day, she’s looking forward to a relaxing weekend with her FWB (friends with benefits) when, halfway down the building, the elevator stalled. Like it’s any hardship with two gorgeous guys stranded together with her?Product Warnings: This book contains explicit sexual situations, graphic language and sexual situations such as anal sex, m/f/m pairing and double penetration.4,300 words
author: Sienna Matthews
